name: Charlie HR Ltd.
description: Developer of an HR management and automation platform designed to provide instant access to essential information. The company's platform automates a lot of the administrative headaches that accompany a growing business, from onboarding new employees to tracking time off and sick days, enabling businesses to streamline their operations and manage them efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of an HR management and automation platform designed to provide instant access to essential information. The company's platform automates a lot of the administrative headaches that accompany a growing business, from onboarding new employees to tracking time off and sick days, enabling businesses to streamline their operations and manage them efficiently.
